plot: A selfish, temperamental composer is blind to the wonderful ability of his self-sacrificing wife. His new concerto is to be played by a great Russian violinist, with whom he falls in love. ...
title: A Concerto for the Violin
plot_es: A selfish, temperamental composer is blind to the wonderful ability of his self-sacrificing wife. His new concerto is to be played by a great Russian violinist, with whom he falls in love. ...
